Title: AN ACT AUTHORIZING THE EXPENDITURE FROM THE FRIAR LANDS FUNDS AND THE SAN LAZARO ESTATE FUND OF THE NECESSARY AMOUNTS FOR THE ACQUISITION OF EQUIPMENT AND PUBLIC WORKS DURING THE CALENDAR YEAR NINETEEN HUNDRED AND TWENTY-TWO
Data:
[ Act No. 3010, March 08, 1922 ]
AN ACT AUTHORIZING THE EXPENDITURE FROM THE FRIAR LANDS FUNDS AND THE SAN LAZARO ESTATE FUND OF THE NECESSARY AMOUNTS FOR THE ACQUISITION OF EQUIPMENT AND PUBLIC WORKS DURING THE CALENDAR YEAR NINETEEN HUNDRED AND TWENTY-TWO
Be it enacted by the Senate and House of Representatives of the Philippines in Legislature assembled and by the authority of the same:
Section 1. The expenditures of the following amounts are hereby authorized from the Friar Lands Funds and the San Lazaro Estate Fund for the calendar year nineteen hundred and twenty-two, in addition to the appropriation contained in sections 1-FF and GG of Act Numbered Twenty-nine hundred and ninety-seven:



FF. - FRIAR LANDS DIVISION





Furniture and Furniture




23
Purchase of furniture and equipment
P600



Total for furniture and equipment
_______P600======



Public works




24
Maintenance and repair of buildings
1,000


25
Maintenance, alteration, and repair of irrigation system and ditches
70,000



Total for public works
_______71,000





Total additional appropriation for the Friar Lands Division to be paid out of its receipts
71,600=======

7!ᕼdMᗄ7

GG. SAN LAZARO ESTATE





Furniture and Equipment




14
Purchase of furniture and equipment
200



Total additional appropriation for San Lazaro Estate to be paid from its receipts
_______200=======


Section 2. This Act shall take effect on January first, nineteen hundred and twenty-two.
 Approved, March 8, 1922.
